title: Make 'Add Javadoc Comment' action available on text selection
description: I could not find the action 'Add Javadoc Comment' until I switched to the Outline view. Currently, we distribute the actions on a personal taste basis, which should be changed. It is not clear to users why some actions are in the context menu and some are not. It is not acceptable to force users to switch the view just to access certain actions in the global menu.
OB: When I selected text, the 'Add Javadoc Comment' action was not available in the context menu.
EB: I expected the 'Add Javadoc Comment' action to be available in the context menu when I selected text.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Select text in the editor. 
2. Check if the 'Add Javadoc Comment' action is available in the context menu. If not, proceed to step 3. 
3. Switch to the Outline view and check if the 'Add Javadoc Comment' action is available in the context menu.
